For some reason the script xdg-desktop-menu hard-codes gnome_user_dir="$HOME/.gnome/apps". This is used by chromium among others. Bug discussion has moved to gitlab and PR with fix exists, however it is not merged yet.

_Relevant Issues:_ https://gitlab.freedesktop.org/xdg/xdg-utils/-/issues/81

_Merge Request:_ https://gitlab.freedesktop.org/xdg/xdg-utils/-/merge_requests/22
